name: Boomi Flow External Storage
description: A microservice that consumes messages from the Boomi Flow External Storage API

DATABASE_URL.description: A JDBC connection string that points to where data should be stored

DATABASE_USERNAME.description: The username to use when connecting to the database

DATABASE_PASSWORD.description: The password to use when connecting to the database

DATABASE_TYPE.description: The type of database (postgresql, mysql or sqlserver)

RECEIVER_KEY.description: You can get this value from the Boomi Flow platform

PLATFORM_KEY.description: You can get this value from the Boomi Flow platform
